tool_description: Manages stakeholder review process, tracks feedback, and consolidates inputs for RFP finalization.

document_id.description: Unique identifier for the RFP document to be reviewed

review_type.description: Type of review: technical, legal, financial, comprehensive

priority_level.description: Review priority: low, medium, high, urgent

error_messages: Invalid document ID: Document ID must reference an existing RFP document.
Invalid review deadline: Deadline must be a future date in ISO 8601 format.
Too many reviewers: Cannot assign more than maximum allowed reviewers.
Empty reviewer list: At least one reviewer role must be specified.
Invalid review type: Use technical, legal, financial, or comprehensive.
Invalid priority level: Use low, medium, high, or urgent.
usage: Provide document_id, reviewer_roles array, and review_deadline. Optionally specify review_type and priority_level. The tool coordinates the review process and tracks stakeholder feedback.

review_session_id.description: Unique identifier for the review session

review_checklist.description: Checklist of items to be reviewed

tracking_framework.description: Framework for tracking review progress and status
